title: Remove Button
description: We need a remove button in our task card. Meke the button red and use Heroicon for tashbin icon.

title: Add Due Date Field
description: Include a due date field in the task card to allow users to set deadlines for tasks.

title: Implement Drag and Drop Functionality
description: Enable users to reorder tasks by dragging and dropping them within the task board.

title: Create Archive Feature
description: Develop a feature to archive completed tasks, keeping the main task board clutter-free.
